name: Butterfly 3. Funny Twins.
description:
The third part of the game Butterfly - Funny Twins!
Enjoy the new 40 levels of original design! Your logical and platformer skills are required!

Game Features


  • You control two caterpillars at the same time;
  • The caterpillars can’t jump on their own - find a way to complete platformer levels!
  • Bounce off the enemies to your advantage!
  • Use pipes – while one caterpillar is in the pipe, the other can move in either direction!
  • Put one caterpillar in a secluded place so the other still free to go!
  • Manage this active team of twins tied by your fingers!
  • Platform skills are useful, but try to find a simple logical solution!
  • 40 challenging levels!

.
